text:
I read with basic auth in zapier, when i post or get to any webhook, my login and password credentials are also sent to the webhook? so my affiliate referral partner who im getting and sending data to can see my zapier login and password anytime I post or get with a webhook?
I'm using a catch hook on their jotform which is then importing those leads who opt into my HubSpot crm...
I'm also using their webhook from jet admin to send update to when google sheet is updated, but why would I want my login and password to be shared with the webhook?
Should I use other auth besides basic auth, so i can avoid having my login credentials shared each time i get or post? am i understanding this correctly?

Hi Support Team!
I have an issue with this <https://api.hubapi.com/contacts/v1/lists/3/add> API. In the attached SS you can see my request payload and the error.
My end goal is I need to upload my users email to HubSpot so I can send them marketing emails.
